title: League Client Login Page, Did not receive a response 1, 2, 3
body: I just updated my League client to the latest patch and now i cannot log on. Every time i try to log on, any account, a popup appears saying "Did not receive a response from the servers, retrying, 1, 2, 3". Then it stops after the 3rd attempt and i cannot log on. My league client was working perfectly fine before the patch and the patch seemed to update fine. I've already uninstalled and reinstalled League, tried solutions on other posts. I cannot try the Internet Explorer method as i do not have IE, used to have Microsoft Edge but that is gone too. I have uninstalled Pandora Media Booster. I am using wired connection.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) for me and post back with a link to your results?
